description: The scholarship is for UCO Students pursing a Forensic Science degree. Eligibility Requirements Student must be a declared Forensic Science student and currently enrolled full-time in the masterÂ’s or undergraduate (Junior/Senior) program Student must provide a UCO transcript showing an overall 3.0 GPA or above in all coursework Student must be enrolled full-time (9 hours for graduate students or 12 hours for undergraduate student) each semester the scholarship is received Preference will be given to students focusing on a career in Firearm and Toolmark Analysis. This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.
